General.Name: Minco Silver Corporation
General.Description: Minco Silver Corporation, an exploration stage company, engages in exploring, evaluating, and developing precious metals mineral properties and projects. The company explores for gold and silver deposits. It holds interests in the Fuwan Silver project. Minco Silver Corporation was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: #2060-1055 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3R5

2.Name: Dr. Robert Allan Quartermain B.Sc., BSc (Hons), DSc, M.Sc., MSc, P.Geo, P.Geo.
